@1@ Public member function, calls the member function {{tt|do_frac_digits}} of the most derived class.

@2@ Returns the number of digits to be displayed after the decimal point when printing monetary values.

===Return value===
The number of digits to be displayed after the decimal point. In common U.S. locales, this is the value {{c|2}}.
